name: Break Punch
description:
In Break Punch you have to master your character and its abilities to take the advantage over the opponent. Will you succeed at learning the acu energy to use it against your friends ? But even if you do, it isn’t enough. In this game, you have to adapt yourself to the constant changing environments which have their own rules. Up to 4 players, alternating between a volleyball match and pure fight, try your best to score the maximum of points between events and eventually, don’t forget to pass the bomb!

 : Play from 2 to 4 players in the Volleyball Mode. Succeed in sending the ball into the opponent's camp with your attacks! Be the first to reach the maximum score to win the matchs! 

 : Play from 2 to 4 players in the Bomb Mode! The goal is very simple!  Do not have the bomb to explode at the end of the countdown. Differents variants exist, for exemple, the bomb can be invisible or it can 2 bombs on the stage but one is fake. We encourage you to discover the over variants by yourself! ;) 

: Play from 2 to 4 players in the Wall Splash Mode! Fight in an arena  which will reduce your fighting space. Walls will scroll from the right to the left so be careful to not touch them!

: Play from 2 to 4 players. Fight in an arena to eject your opponent with your characters' move set.  No special rules here, only your skill will grants you the  victory! 

A mix of platform fighting combat mechanics and mini games in the same games!

 Use the parry to fill your acu mode gauge and use your special skills!

  Multiple mini games like Volleyball, Bomb and Wall Splash.

  Unique signature moves to each character.

 Simple but flashy combos!

 Cyberpunk universe mixing street art with a cartoon style!

  Play with your friends up to 4 players!

  Use the training mode to master your skills!

In this alternative universe, humanity was born with the natural ability to accumulate kinetic energy. It is known as Acu energy.

Once, humans learned the art of charging themselves with this “accumulation energy” allowing them to make use of it in many ways. The strongest were able to learn the Acu (the martial art of accumulation) and were known in the world as Acu warriors.

Our story takes place in the futuristic megalopolis named Heart-City. A city-state that leads the world with its knowledge of the accumulation technology. When Humanity started to rely on technology, progressively most of the world population ‘strangely’ lost the ability to use Acu energy.  A few Acu warriors remain, they are known as the suburbs leaders of Heart City. They are employed by the city to fight each other in tournaments to “charge” the batteries of Heart City. This energy is then sold to the citizens of every district.
